value.title: Could a robot win a Grammy? AI music is eligible — sort of
value.excerpt: Hold the (gramo)phone: Artificial intelligence-generated music is eligible for Grammy Awards — err, kind of. value.title: Microsoft’s stock rallies to record close as more analysts see AI leadership
